posts.author: Vinleboiteux
posts.content:
Hi everyone,

Just trying to determine my gear goals on my wizard. I imagine its environment dependant. But if we think in standard gear that I can find in most modules. Here is what i was thinking, let me know if i’m missing something.

Chest : Best robes I can find !
Head: Hood of intellect or similar
Gloves: Concentration
Cloak: really not sure. Maybe the best cloak with + to saves that I can find ?
Boots: Travelling, haste or immunity to knockdown if I get haste somewhere else.
Rings: probly one ring of wizardry and one with int ? Or more saves ?
Amulet: probly switch between something with spellslots and something with immunities depending on what I’m facing.
Belt: fear/death magic immunity I imagine.

I’m sort of ignoring deflection AC items and Natural armor amulets because I figure I shouldnt really be tanking and I have some spells to cover those.

Am I on the right track ?

Ty :)

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
A lot will depend on whether you intend to be a caster from distance, archer type, or melee mage (if the latter, your best guidance will come from Web Shaman's Melee Mage), whether you're planning on being a pure Wiz, or which class(es) you want to multi-class with.

Not the most helpful answer, but a little more detail would help get a better one!

Cheers
